attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Surely we all hold family vaules dear, The CSA should look into these values, what is more important in a childs life a strong role model (Non reseident parent). or not knowing their parent becuase the CSA is taken too much money the no resident parent cannot afford to go though the courts to aquire access, This goverment belives in family vaules it is about time they showed it.

rejection.details: The petition, especially the title, must be a state what action you want the government to take.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
